name: Boxed Away - Search for Mr. Skatla
name_original: Boxed Away - Search for Mr. Skatla
description:
The evil witch Neatrix was planning to go about her business when she suddenly realized that her beloved cat Mr Skatla was missing. So she sets out to find the feline animal, but that would be a short game if the cat was quickly found.

Instead, she has to deal with an Austrian physicist and, consequently, with enchanted boxes.
